links.name: Control Rig
links.description: Rigger control implant with built in sim module to use for DNI with other devices

links.name: Datajack
links.description: Direct interface with electronic device via cables. If wireless adds rating 1 noise reduction

links.name: Data Lock
links.description: It makes user a walking data safe. It is not wireless

links.name: Olfactory Booster
links.description: Records smells and plays them back later.

links.name: Simrig
links.description: Record sensory data for later replay

links.name: Skilljack
links.description: Skill headware to interpret knowsoft and linguasofts to be used later as your own. Also runs activesofts but needs skillwires. If wireless bosts rating limit to rating x 3

links.name: Taste booster
links.description: Gustatory data in AR and VR. Applies to perception tests

links.name: Ultrasound Sensor
links.description: When active replaces normal vision. Switch betwen  active sonar and passive sonar or off with Free action

links.name: Voice Modulator
links.description: Adds rating to impersionation skill tests. Forbidden
